net.jini.discovery

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jini.discovery.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends Object
    A holder class for constants that pertain to the unicast and multicast discovery protocols.

    The following properties if set, provide support for IPv6:

  • net.jini.discovery.IPv6=TRUE
  • net.jini.discovery.GLOBAL_ANNOUNCE=TRUE

    Note that support for global announcement must be specifically set to be enabled. There is no support for global request, for obvious reasons.

Author:
Sun Microsystems, Inc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short discoveryPort
      The port for both unicast and multicast boot requests.
      static Boolean GLOBAL_ANNOUNCE
      If true and IPv6 is also true, the announcement protocol will propagate over global networks.
      static Boolean IPv6
      If true IPv6 has been enabled.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static InetAddress getAnnouncementAddress()
      Return the address of the multicast group over which the multicast announcement protocol takes place.
      static InetAddress getRequestAddress()
      Return the address of the multicast group over which the multicast request protocol takes place.
